summary: INCORRECT LABELING ON CAR SEAT.  SPECIFICALLY, ON THE  EVENFLO PORT ABOUT INFANT SEAT (MODEL NUMBER 5841265P1), A DECAL ON THE SIDE OF THE SEAT SHOWS THE CORRECT ROUTING OF THE SEAT BELT FOR BOTH "LAP BELT ONLY" AND "LAP/SHOULDER BELT."  HOWEVER, THE PICTURES ARE LABELED REVERSED.  I.E. THE LAP BELT ONLY PICTURE IS LABELED WITH LAP/SHOULDER BELT AND VISE VERSA.  THIS WAS NOTICED DURING A CHILD SAFETY SEAT INSPECTION.  *JB
